intro: Here you will find information about our college, specialties, teachers, and student life.

home.hero_subtitle: Modern education for future IT industry leaders
home.welcome_text: We offer quality education in information technology and prepare specialists for the digital economy

home.itm_description: IT project management and technological solutions
